titles.title: Delisting Gray Wolves to Restore State Management Act of 2011
A bill to provide for the status of the Northern Rocky Mountain distinct population segment of the gray wolf, and for other purposes.
Delisting Gray Wolves to Restore State Management Act of 2011

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: Delisting Gray Wolves to Restore State Management Act of 2011 - Grants the full force and effect of law to the final rule entitled "Endangered and Threatened Wildlife and Plants; Final Rule To Identify the Northern Rocky Mountain Population of Gray Wolf as a Distinct Population Segment and To Revise the List of Endangered and Threatened Wildlife."
